message: Good tip instead of including zillions of fonts why we don't make them inside a font and use the font-face to display them!
caption: Attachment UnavailableThis attachment may have been removed or the person who shared it may not have permission to share it with you.

data.message:
فكرة حلوة بس ممكن تتعمل الايقونات كلها في صورة واحدة 
وتستخدم خاصية background-scroll 
وده حل قديم بس كويس واسرع من عمل فونت مخصوص

using sprite is ok but the size of big sprite is terrible because you will have to embed all your icons in png file ... using fonts for icons is much better because if you change your icons size you will have to change your sprite and your css correct? in fonts all what you have to do is to update your font file and that's it :) also you don't have to make a special font you can google icons font generator.
